mapper.sql: SELECT tb.booking_id, tb.order_number, tb.tour_id, tb.tour_type, tb.user_id, tb.agent_id, tb.operator_id, tb.booking_date, tb.flight_number, tb.arrival_landing_time, tb.return_flight_number, tb.departure_departure_time, tb.tour_start_date, tb.tour_end_date, tb.pickup_date, tb.dropoff_date, tb.pickup_location, tb.dropoff_location, tb.service_type, tb.group_size, tb.adult_count, tb.child_count, tb.luggage_count, tb.passenger_contact, tb.contact_person, tb.contact_phone, tb.hotel_level, tb.room_type, tb.hotel_room_count, tb.room_details, tb.special_requests, tb.itinerary_details, tb.status, tb.payment_status, tb.total_price, tb.selected_optional_tours, tb.created_at, tb.updated_at, tb.group_type, tb.group_size_limit, tb.arrival_departure_time, tb.departure_departure_time, tb.hotel_check_in_date, tb.hotel_check_out_date, CASE WHEN tb.tour_type = 'day_tour' THEN dt.name WHEN tb.tour_type = 'group_tour' THEN gt.title ELSE 'Unknown Tour' END AS tour_name, CASE WHEN tb.tour_type = 'day_tour' THEN dt.location WHEN tb.tour_type = 'group_tour' THEN gt.location ELSE 'Unknown Location' END AS tour_location, CASE WHEN tb.tour_type = 'day_tour' THEN dt.image_url WHEN tb.tour_type = 'group_tour' THEN gt.image_url ELSE NULL END AS tour_image, CONCAT(u.first_name, ' ', u.last_name) AS user_name, a.company_name AS agent_name, ao.name AS operator_name FROM tour_bookings tb LEFT JOIN day_tours dt ON tb.tour_type = 'day_tour' AND tb.tour_id = dt.day_tour_id LEFT JOIN group_tours gt ON tb.tour_type = 'group_tour' AND tb.tour_id = gt.group_tour_id LEFT JOIN users u ON tb.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN agents a ON tb.agent_id = a.id LEFT JOIN agent_operators ao ON tb.operator_id = ao.id
mapper.select: /* OrderMapper.getPassengersByBookingId: Ê≠£Âú®Êü•ËØ¢ËÆ¢ÂçïID ${bookingId} ÁöÑÊâÄÊúâ‰πòÂÆ¢‰ø°ÊÅØ */ SELECT p.passenger_id, p.full_name, p.gender, p.date_of_birth, p.is_child as isChild, p.child_age as childAge, p.passport_number as passportNumber, p.passport_expiry as passportExpiry, p.nationality, p.phone, /* ‰πòÂÆ¢ÁîµËØùÂè∑Á†Å */ p.wechat_id as wechatId, /* ‰πòÂÆ¢ÂæÆ‰ø°ID */ p.email, p.emergency_contact_name as emergencyContactName, p.emergency_contact_phone as emergencyContactPhone, p.dietary_requirements as dietaryRequirements, p.medical_conditions as medicalConditions, p.luggage_count as luggageCount, p.special_requests as specialRequests, bpr.is_primary as isPrimary, bpr.ticket_number as ticketNumber, bpr.seat_number as seatNumber, bpr.luggage_tags as luggageTags, bpr.check_in_status as checkInStatus FROM booking_passenger_relation bpr JOIN passengers p ON bpr.passenger_id = p.passenger_id WHERE bpr.booking_id = #{bookingId} ORDER BY bpr.is_primary DESC, p.full_name ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tour_bookings( order_number, tour_id, tour_type, user_id, agent_id, operator_id, booking_date, flight_number, return_flight_number, tour_start_date, tour_end_date, pickup_date, dropoff_date, pickup_location, dropoff_location, service_type, group_size, adult_count, child_count, luggage_count, passenger_contact, contact_person, contact_phone, hotel_level, room_type, hotel_room_count, room_details, special_requests, itinerary_details, status, payment_status, total_price, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{orderNumber}, #{tourId}, #{tourType}, #{userId}, #{agentId}, #{operatorId}, #{bookingDate}, #{flightNumber}, #{returnFlightNumber}, #{tourStartDate}, #{tourEndDate}, #{pickupDate}, #{dropoffDate}, #{pickupLocation}, #{dropoffLocation}, #{serviceType}, #{groupSize}, #{adultCount}, #{childCount}, #{luggageCount}, #{passengerContact}, #{contactPerson}, #{contactPhone}, #{hotelLevel}, #{roomType}, #{hotelRoomCount}, #{roomDetails}, #{specialRequests}, #{itineraryDetails}, #{status}, #{paymentStatus}, #{totalPrice}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} )
